owl:Ontology.terms:creator: http://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/members/DGarijo#me
https://www.abdn.ac.uk/ncs/profiles/milan.markovic/
owl:Ontology.terms:description: PROV extension for linking Plans and parts of plans to their respective executions.
owl:Ontology.terms:title: The EP-Plan ontology
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: PROV extension for linking Plans and parts of plans to their respective executions.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:correspondsToCommunicationSpecification links ep-plan:Communication to its planned specification.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: correspondsToCommunicationSpecification

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:correspondsToStep links a ep-plan:Activity to its planned ep-plan:Step
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: correspondsToStep

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:correspondsToVariable binds a ep-plan:Entity (used by a ep-plan:Activity in the execution of a plan) to the ep-plan:Variable it represented it in the ep-plan:Plan.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: correspondsToVariable

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:evaluatedAgainst links ep-plan:Activity or ep-plan:Communication to an ep-plan:Constraint. The use of subproperties of ep-plan:evaluatedAgainst is encouraged to indicate whether the execution trace element satisfied the constraint.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: evaluatedAgainst

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:evaluatedTraceElement links ep-plan:ConstriantEvaluation to a ep-plan:Activity or ep-plan:Communication that were evaluated against a ep-plan:Constraint defined in the plan.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: evaluatedTraceElement

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:hasConstraint links ep-plan:Step, ep-plan:CommunicationSpec or ep-plan:Plan to a ep-plan:Constraint. Please note, that we do not stipulate that this constriant must be strictly satisfied before the plan can continue. This is to enable inclusions of constraints defined by policies which can be violated under certain conditions and to also enable capture of incorrect behaviour of a system (e.g. a plan ignored a constriant).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasConstraint

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:hasConstraintImplementation links ep-plan:Constraint to any resource that provides details on how such constraint is implemented (e.g. a rule, script, etc.).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasConstraintImplementation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:hasInputVariable binds a ep-plan:Step to the ep-plan:Variable that takes as input for the planned execution.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasInputVariable

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:hasOutputVariable binds a ep-plan:Step to the ep-plan:Variable that will be produced as output in the planned execution
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasOutputVariable

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:hasPart links amn ep-plan:MultiVariable to another ep-plan:Variable that represents a smaller part of a composite variable.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasPart

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:hasPayload links an ep-plan:Variable to an ep-plan:CommsSpec and identyfies the variable that will be transferred according to the ep-plan:CommsSpec.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasPayload

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:hasPermittedAgent links ep-plan:Step or the overall ep-plan:Plan to an ep-plan:ResponsibleAgent denoting that the agent is allowed to assume some form of responsibility during the execution. Please note that not all linked ep-plan:ResponsibleAgent(s) must also appear in the execution trace as ep-plan:Agent. ep-plan:hasPermittedAgent relationship merely indicates that it is possible for this agent to asssume some responsibility during the execution.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasPermittedAgent

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A property linking a plan element to the description of a rationale which provides some information on why such element was included in a plan.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasRationale

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:hasRecipient links an ep-plan:Step to an ep-plan:CommsSpec and indicates that the step is expected to receive an ep-plan:Variable that will be transferred according to the ep-plan:CommsSpec.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasRecipient

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:hasSender links an ep-plan:Step to an ep-plan:CommsSpec and indicates that the step is expected to produce an ep-plan:Variable that will be transferred according to the ep-plan:CommsSpec.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasSender

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:isAchievedBy links ep-plan:Objective to a plan or individual plan element that is expected to achieve the objective specified by ep-plan:Objective.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isAchievedBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:isCommunicationSpecificationOfPlan binds a ep-plan:CommunicationSpecification to the ep-plan:Plan it corresponds to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isCommunicationSpecificationOfPlan

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:isConstraintOfPlan binds a ep-plan:Constraint to the ep-plan:Plan it corresponds to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isConstraintOfPlan

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The ep-plan:isDecomposedAsPlan relationship binds a ep-plan:MultiStep to the ep-plan:Plan holding the definition of that step. That is, ep-plan:isDecomposedAsPlan links the MultiStep to the Plan sptecification where it is decomposed.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isDecomposedAsPlan

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:isElementOfPlan binds a ep-plan:PlanElement to the ep-plan:Plan it corresponds to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isElementOfPlan

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:isObjectiveOfPlan binds a ep-plan:Objective to the ep-plan:Plan it corresponds to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isObjectiveOfPlan

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:isPolicyOfPlan binds a ep-plan:Policy to the ep-plan:Plan it corresponds to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isPolicyOfPlan

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property that asserts which Step preceeds the current one.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isPrecededBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:isResponsibleAgentOfPlan binds a ep-plan:ResponsibleAgent to the ep-plan:Plan it corresponds to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isResposibleAgentOfPlan

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:isStepOfPlan binds a ep-plan:Step to the ep-plan:Plan it corresponds to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isStepOfPlan

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A ep-plan:Plan may be a subplan of another bigger ep-plan:Plan. The relation ep-plan:isSubPlanOfPlan is used to state the link among the two different plans. Note that if p1 is a sub-plan of p2, p1 will not necessarily be a step of p2. A multistep will represent p1 in p2, and link to p1 with the hasStepDecomposition relationship.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isSubPlanOfPlan

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:isVariableOfPlan binds a ep-plan:Variable to the ep-plan:Plan it corresponds to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isVariableOfPlan

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:satisfied links ep-plan:Activity or ep-plan:Communication to a ep-plan:Constraint. The property indicates that the execution trace element satisfied the constraint.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: satisfied

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:satisfied links ep-plan:Activity or ep-plan:Communication to a ep-plan:Constraint. The property indicates that the execution trace element did not satisfy the constraint.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: violated

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An element of an execution trace representing an individual process/activity corresponding to a step of a plan and which used and/or generated trace entities.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Activity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A human or computational agent that can be responsible for the execution of an activity corresponding to a planned step or the overall plan execution.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Agent

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: ep-plan:Communication is a type of prov:Communication representing a transfer of an entity between two activities according to some planned specification expressed as ep-plan:CommsSpec.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Communication

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A specification of how communication/exchange of variables between two steps should be performed.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: CommunicationSpecification

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A restriction placed on a particular step or a plan that is evaluated against an execution trace.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Constraint

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A concept used to qualify the relationship between a trace activity and a constraint associated with a step to which such activity corresponds to. The concept provides an opportunity to link additional information documenting the constraint evaluation process (e.g. a tool or an algorithm used to check for constraint violations, time when constraints were evaluated, etc.).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConstraintEvaluation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An element of an execution trace representing an indidual entity corresponding to a variable of a plan which was used and/or generated by activities recorded in the execution trace.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Entity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A collection of entities corresponding to ep-plan:MultiVariable. ep-pla:Entity contained in such collection corresponds to ep-plan:Variable that is linked to ep-plan:MultiVariable and defined in the subplan of a plan that the ep-plan:MultiVariable is defined in. Entity Collection is typically used or generated by Multi Activity.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Entity Collection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A collection of trace elements that were generated during a single plan execution.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Execution Trace Bundle

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A concept representing an activity that was not executed in full, for example, due to constraint violation. Such an activity usually marks the point when the plan execution was interrupted due to some problem.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Failed Activity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An activity that typically corresponds to a MultiStep which is decomposed as a Plan or the main execution activity that executed the plan. ep-plan:MultiActivity typically generates ep-plan:ExecutionTraceBundle.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Multi Activity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An ep-plan:MultiStep is the representation of a composite step that can be described (decomposed) as another ep-plan:Plan.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: MultiStep

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An ep-plan:MultiVariable represents a composite variable that can be broken down into smaller parts represented as ep-plan:Variable(s).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: MultiVariable

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This utility concept can be used to identify a specific result that a plan aims to achieve. This class can be used, for example, to annotate steps and variables that represent some end results. More complex plans can have more than one objectives. Users are encouraged to extend this class, for example, to identify primary and secondary objectives of a plan.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Objective

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An ep-plan:Plan is a specific type of prov:Plan. It is composed of smaller steps that use and produce variables.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Plan

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A generic representation of a collection of rules that may be applicable in the context of a specific plan. A policy can provide a rationale for constraints being applied to steps as well as explain reasons including other plan elements. For example, a data protection policy might require that steps are executed by specific agents and that a data anonymisation step is included in the plan.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Policy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A generic concept describing a specific justification of a plan or an individual plan element. For example, a data anonymisation step might be included in the plan to protect personal information as a result of a data protection policy associated with a plan (i.e. the reason for including such a step in a plan). Similarly, a data protection policy associated with a plan can be linked to a description of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) which provides the reason why such policy was implemented.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rationale

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An agent that can bear some responsibility for execution of activities corresponding to the planned steps.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ResponsibleAgent

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An ep-plan:Step represents the planned execution activity.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Step

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An ep-plan:Variable represents a description of the input of the planned Activity (ep-plan:Step)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Variable
